summary: Migrated template engine of web app from dust to glimmer.
Worked extensively in EmberJS to improve current features and add new features in a web app.
Plan estimate and develop new features from scratch.
Migrated web app from Angular to React.
Integrated Kendo UI and Fluent UI with React.
Refine back-end of Angular based web app with micro-service architecture.
Create and improve CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments of Webapp and NuGet packages.
Worked extensively on improving and adding new features and pages with cross browser compatibility to Angular based web app.
Refined and created micro-service architecture for the app.
Worked on creating extension for Azure DevOps and VS Code.
Unit testing and end-to-end testing, worked with Jasmine, protractor and selenium.
Created a time critical and high impact Angular based web app (SPA) from scratch.
